ApplicationConfirmationView.NoteCode: Note down the process number. This is necessary to later view the status of your application.

ApplicationInfoBox.BasicExplanation: Select the course for which you would like to have credits transferred. Then enter the details of the modules you like to have credited. You can add as many module assignments as you need.

ModuleAssignment.Heading: Module Assignment
ModuleAssignment.0: Modules earned at other universities you like to have credited as modules of Leipzig University.
ModuleAssignment.1: Only specifically related modules should be written in a single module assignment.
ModuleAssignment.2: You can add multiple module assignments for the entire application.

ExternalModules.Heading: Modules to be credited
ExternalModules.0: Enter one or more module(s) completed at another university.
ExternalModules.1: The given fields must be filled in.
ExternalModules.2: Enter the credit system (ECTS or other).
ExternalModules.3: A PDF file with the official description of the individual module must be uploaded as the module description.

ModulesLeipzig.Heading: Modules of Leipzig University
ModulesLeipzig.0: Select one or more module(s) for which you would like to have credits transferred.
ModulesLeipzig.1: If you cannot find a suitable module, you also have the option of not selecting one.

Comment.Heading: Comment
Comment.0: Further information on this module assignment can be entered here, this is optional.

ExternalModules.Heading: Modules to be credited
ExternalModules.2: point u system gibt ein issue

ErrorViewIndexjs.NoAccesContent: Permission is missing to display this page.
ErrorViewIndexjs.ServerUnreachableContent: The server is currently unreachable. Please try again later.
ErrorViewIndexjs.SiteNotFoundContent: The requested page does not exist.
ErrorViewIndexjs.SomethingWentWrongContent: There was an unhandled error. Please try again. If the error persists, please contact the administrators.

HomepageView.ApplicationCode: process Number of the Application to be Accessed
HomepageView.AriaProcessNumberOfApplication: process Number of the Application to be Accessed
HomepageView.makeApplicationExplanation: Have credits, you earned at other universities, credited for modules at Leipzig University. This is useful, for example, if you are transferring from another university to Leipzig University, returning after a semester abroad, or taking courses concurrently at another university.
HomepageView.viewStatusExplanation: Enter the 6-digit process number, provided to you when you submitted the application, to view the status. Alternatively you can find this process number in the overview PDF of your application.

LoginView.InvalidData: Invalid login data. Please try again

PanelExternalModulesItem.PointsNum: Points must be specified as a number

PanelInternalModules.NoModulesSelected: No modules of Leipzig University are selected.

SideInfoApplicationProcess.GoToStudy: Once the application is completed, go to the study office with all relevant documents

SideInfoStudyOffice.Faculty: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
SideInfoStudyOffice.OfficeHourTimes: Tuesday and Thursday: 9:00 am - 11:30 am and 12:30 pm - 4:00 pm

StatusDetailView.FinalDecisionExplanation: A final decision has been made on your application. This is only information about the possibility of recognition. To officially have your credits recognized, you must go to the study office. Please bring all relevant documents that prove the completion of the credits to be recognized. If you have further questions about your application, please contact the study office.
StatusDetailView.FormalMistakeExplanation: Your application was rejected due to formal errors. The module assignments containing formal errors are marked in red. In the module assignment, you will find an explanation of the specific error at the bottom. Please correct all indicated errors. Then you can resubmit your application.

StatusPanel.NotYetDecided: No decision has been made yet
